name: CreateDisplacementField
description: Create an itkImage of itkVector pixels (NOT an itkVectorImage), using each scalar input component image for each vector component. An itkImage of itkVectors is the standard type for displacement fields in ITK. All component images (up to 8) are assumed to have the same size, offset, origin, and spacing. The 'EnforceZeroBoundaryFlag' option will create zero-valued vectors along the borders when enabled (pass 1), and is recommended for better displacement field behavior.
author: ANTs Developers

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimension of the image, typically 2 or 3.

inputs.name: Enforce Zero Boundary Flag
inputs.description: Create zero-valued vectors along the borders when enabled (pass 1), recommended for better displacement field behavior.

inputs.name: Component Images
inputs.description: Input component images, each used for a vector component. All component images must have the same size, offset, origin, and spacing.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output displacement field image with itkVector pixels.

output-files.name: Output Displacement Field
output-files.description: The generated itkImage of itkVector pixels representing the displacement field.
